StatisticObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

StatisticObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

StatisticObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Statistic_Data.description: Ledger / Budget Structure of Statistic Reference

validation.validation: Enter either Ledger Type or Budget Structures for Ledger Budget Structure Statistic Reference, not both
validation.description: Enter either Ledger Type or Budget Structures for Ledger Budget Structure Statistic Reference, not both

validation.validation: All Budget Structures should have same Entry (by Summary or by Period)
validation.description: All Budget Structures should have same Entry (by Summary or by Period)

validation.validation: All Budget Structures by summary should have same summary schedule
validation.description: All Budget Structures by summary should have same summary schedule

validation.validation: Ledger / Budget Structure values of Statistic must be among Ledger / Budget Structures of Statistic Definition
validation.description: Ledger / Budget Structure values of Statistic must be among Ledger / Budget Structures of Statistic Definition

validation.validation: Statistic must have a value for Ledger Budget Structure Reference if Statistic Definition does not have Actuals. Edit the Statistic Definition to include Actuals or Input a value for Statistic's Ledger Budget Structure Reference.

Statistic_Data.description: Statistic Values Reference, which includes Company (if the Statistics Definition requires it), required dimensions as worktags, and line values. If Company is not included, it should not be included in the line data.
